trans-unit.source: Represents the error thrown if the data service returns a response code less than 200 or greater than 299, or the top-level element in the response is <c><error></c>.
trans-unit.target: 表示如果資料服務傳回小於 200 或大於 299 的回應碼，或在回應中的最上層元素是 <c><error></c> 時擲回的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 以系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply".
trans-unit.target: 此建構函式會將新執行個體的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 屬性初始化為系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，例如 "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 說明例外狀況的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 說明例外狀況的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: Error message text.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息文字。

trans-unit.source: Exception object that contains the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 包含內部例外狀況的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse" /> 物件

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the response as a <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得回應做為 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse" /> 物件。
